entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
